title: For Sale: Old Judge of Hank O'Day

posts.post_title: For Sale: Old Judge of Hank O'Day
posts.post_content:
Actually, two available:

1. 1887 Hands at Chest pose----beautiful photo, two extremely minor surface wrinkles, clean back--gone
2. 1887 Batting pose--well worn (image in Lot 1016 from latest Legendary auction)-----gone

I do not have a scanner where I am now but the first card is satisfaction guaranteed. Please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks--Jay
